name: Magnet or Gun
description:
Made in 72 hours for ScoreSpace Jam#18

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Controller:

Move - A/D Key or Left/Right Arrow Keys

Jump - Space Key

Fire - Mouse Button 1

Use Magnet - Mouse Button 2

Restart - R Key

- Developers - 

Developer - Yusuf Emre(hello9uys)

Music & Sound Effect - Serhat(Panic0)

Art - Berat

Don't forget to share your high scores with us by messaging to us !!
